title: 6 days to go: TechCrunch Disrupt 2024 kicks off and ticket prices go up
content:

Join 10,000 industry leaders from around the world at Moscone West in San Francisco from October 28-30 to witness groundbreaking discussions with top-tier industry experts, elite networking, an exciting showcase of the newest tech innovations, and so much more. title: Artiphon’s new Orba instrument can sample sounds live
content:
Almost exactly two years after releasing the Orba 2, Artiphon is completing the trilogy. The newly announced Orba 3 finds the Nashville-based startup baking live sampling into its clever handheld instrument. The feature arrives by way of a built-in microphone, which lets users record their voice, instruments, and other sounds. All of that can be […]

title: The US AI Safety Institute stands on shaky ground
content:
One of the only U.S. government offices dedicated to assessing AI safety is in danger of being dismantled if Congress doesn’t choose to authorize it. The U.S. AI Safety Institute (AISI), a federal government body that studies risks in AI systems, was created in November 2023 as a part of President Joe Biden’s AI Executive […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

title: Anthropic’s new AI model can control your PC
content:
Anthropic has released an updated version of its Claude 3.5 Sonnet model with a new Computer Use feature that can interact with apps on a PC.

title: Footwork, Construct Capital, and Bessemer Venture Partners discuss how to raise capital in 2025 at TechCrunch Disrupt 2024
content:
The fundraising landscape is shifting fast, and in 2025, the old rules no longer apply. Startups navigating flat, down, or extension rounds must be more strategic than ever in securing their next round of capital. Traditional metrics like $100 million in revenue for an IPO or $1 million ARR for a Series A are becoming […]

title: Ex-SpaceX engineers land $14M to scale new method for 3D printing metal
content:
3D printing objects using metal is a well-established technique, but it tends to be too complex, expensive, or imprecise to match traditional methods at scale. Armed with $14 million from Nvidia and Boeing, Freeform aims to change that, building a new metal additive printing process that they say changes the game — and yes, there’s […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

title: Stability claims its newest Stable Diffusion models generate more ‘diverse’ images
content:
Following a string of controversies stemming from technical hiccups and licensing changes, AI startup Stability AI has announced its latest family of image generation models. The new Stable Diffusion 3.5 series is more customizable and versatile than Stability’s previous-generation tech, the company claims — as well as more performant. There are three models in total: […]

title: Interface.ai raises $30M to help banks field customer requests
content:
Interface.ai, a customer automation platform for banks and other financial institutions, today announced that it closed a $30 million funding round led by Avataar Venture Partners. $20 million of the round was equity, while the remaining $10 million was in the form of debt. It’s Interface’s first outside capital; the startup had been completely bootstrapped. […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

title: Spotify now lets you create custom cover art for your playlists
content:
Spotify is rolling out the ability for users to design and customize their own playlist cover art, the company announced on Tuesday. While users have already been able to upload a custom image for a playlist, this new feature lets you design you own cover art right in the app. The feature is rolling out […]

title: As Ozlo’s Sleepbuds go on sale, company raises funds for tinnitus treatment
content:
Bose gave up on Sleepbuds after two generations. It was a sad, premature end for a promising product. The headphone maker came closer to creating a truly great pair of sleep headphones than anyone else. Ultimately, however, it seems the company was no longer interested in pursuing the product, which proved a major setback for […]

title: iPad Mini 2024: Keeping up with the pack
content:

The same could have been said about the Mac a few years prior, but the laptop/desktop has had a renaissance in Cupertino, […]

title: WhatsApp introduces contact storing directly within the app, teases usernames
content:
WhatsApp on Tuesday announced a new feature that will allow users to save contacts within the app. That means that even if you lose your phone or link a new device to your primary number, you will see all your contacts stored within WhatsApp’s cloud storage. Until now, WhatsApp relied on your phone’s contact book […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

title: Socket lands a fresh $40M to scan software for security flaws
content:
The software supply chain, which comprises the components and processes used to develop software, has become precarious. According to one recent survey, 88% of companies believe poor software supply chain security presents an “enterprise-wide risk” to their organizations. Open source supply chain components are especially fraught, thanks to the logistical hurdles in keeping each component well-maintained. […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

title: Desktop AI assistant app Highlight spins out of Medal with $10M in funding
content:
Earlier this year, Medal, a startup known for its video game clipping features, launched a cross-platform AI assistant called Highlight. Now, the company is spinning off Highlight into a new entity, which has raised $10 million in a funding round. General Catalyst led the funding round with Valor, SV Angel, and Conviction Embed participating in […]

title: CrewAI uses third-party models to automate business tasks
content:
